summary: The Contoso Wireless product phone is a great device that comes with a 5.7-inch full HD display, a powerful octa-core processor, 64GB of internal storage, dual-camera system, fingerprint scanner, advanced facial recognition system, 3200 mAh battery with fast charging technology, compatibility with the Contoso Wireless network, VoLTE technology for crystal clear calls, one year warranty, and a range of accessories. Customers can also take advantage of a 10% discount when purchasing the product phone from Contoso Wireless and additional discounts when signing up for the loyalty program.
